event.title: Technology Week
event.subtitle: SENAI Sorocaba 2025
event.description: Three days of innovation, learning, and networking for Software and Mechatronics students.

talks.title: Introduction to Generative AI
talks.speaker: João Silva
talks.description: Explore the fundamental concepts and practical applications of generative AI in 2025. Learn how AI is transforming industries.

talks.title: The Future of Web Development
talks.speaker: Ana Costa
talks.description: Discover cutting-edge web technologies and frameworks shaping the future of digital experiences.

talks.title: IoT and Smart Manufacturing
talks.speaker: Maria Souza
talks.description: Understanding how Internet of Things is revolutionizing the manufacturing industry with real-world examples.

talks.title: Cybersecurity in 2025
talks.speaker: Carlos Mendes
talks.description: Critical insights into protecting systems and data in an increasingly connected world.

talks.title: Robotics and Automation
talks.speaker: Pedro Lima
talks.description: Hands-on workshop on modern robotics, automation techniques, and their applications in mechatronics.

talks.title: Building Scalable Cloud Solutions
talks.speaker: Juliana Santos
talks.description: Learn best practices for designing and deploying cloud-native applications at scale.

speakers.name: João Silva
speakers.bio: AI researcher and software engineer with 10+ years of experience in machine learning and generative models.

speakers.name: Ana Costa
speakers.bio: Senior full-stack developer specializing in modern web frameworks and progressive web applications.

speakers.name: Maria Souza
speakers.bio: Mechatronics engineer and automation specialist leading IoT initiatives in aerospace manufacturing.

speakers.name: Carlos Mendes
speakers.bio: Cybersecurity expert with extensive experience in threat detection and security architecture.

speakers.name: Pedro Lima
speakers.bio: Robotics engineer passionate about automation and Industry 4.0 technologies.

speakers.name: Juliana Santos
speakers.bio: Cloud solutions architect helping enterprises migrate and scale their infrastructure on AWS.
